properties.areaDesc: Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary; St Ignace to False Detour Channel; 5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc Island
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 3 at 3:53PM EST until January 6 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 35 kt and highest waves around 5
feet possible.

* WHERE...St Ignace to False Detour Channel, 5NM East of
Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc
Island and Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including
Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary.

* WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous highest waves which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and highest
waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
